text: Juan Carlos Cáceres (4 September 1936 - 5 April 2015) was an Argentine jazz and tango musician, singer-songwriter, and painter. He began his career in 1977 and created "Tango negro". For most of his career, he worked and lived in France. He released 12 albums between 1993 and 2011. Cáceres was born in Buenos Aires. He died from cancer on 5 April 2015 in Perigny, near Paris, aged 78. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Argentine painters Category:Argentine singer-songwriters Category:Argentine pianists Category:Cancer deaths in France Category:Musicians from Buenos Aires Category:Singers from Buenos Aires Category:Writers from Buenos Aires
title: Juan Carlos Cáceres
